answers.answer: You really need an OCT to define what kind of MD you have.

question: I have had bilateral catarct surgery 3 years ago .I noticed blurriness in the medial aspect of one eye the past 10 days.The opthalmologist i saw today , said it is macular degeneration and referred me to a retina specialist.my question is that I am on aspirin daily and have nomal BP and no diabetes, normal cholesterol on statins.Are there any other causes for this little hemmorhage or is it only macular degeration.My doctor was unsympathetic to answer any more questions!!!
title: retinal memorrhge
